author: Joe Battenfeld
title: Battenfeld: Bidens Ministry of Truth sparks mockery, fears

sentence: Or do you have faith in the proven leadership of Donald Trump, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, Virginia Governor Glenn Youngkin and dozens of other Republicans who stand ready to swing the pendulum of America back to sanity in 2022.
author: Tom Tradup
title: Democrats Gleefully Bankrupting America
